short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harbor is a browser extension that helps you organize tabs, navigate seamlessly, and pick up right where you left off.

long.en:
A ready-to-use Chrome Tabs management tool, offering a better user experience than OneTab

## Kanban-style Tab Management UI
- ğŸ¯ Manage tab collections through drag-and-drop in a Trello-like kanban board
- ğŸ”„ Restore tab collections to browser windows with one click
- ğŸ’¾ Local-first: Your tab data is primarily stored on your local device. Import and export anytime
- ğŸ”’ Automatic local file backup ensures your tabs are always accessible and never lost

## Instant Tab Organization in Popup Window
- ğŸ¤– AI-powered smart tab grouping
- ğŸŒ Automatic tab grouping by domain
- ğŸ—‘ï¸ One-click duplicate tab removal for current window
- ğŸ’¾ Save All Tabs: Quickly save tabs to Harbor while preserving "tab group" structure

## Third-party App Sync: From "Temporary" Tab Collections to "Permanent" Bookmarks
- ğŸ”— Supports syncing tabs with Notion and Raindrop, allowing you to permanently save important tab collections. Through this sync functionality, Harbor helps seamlessly combine temporary tab management with long-term information storage.
